name: Exile of The Last Prince
description:
Play as the commander of an army, a prince who's throne was stolen from him, a man seeking his revenge.

A game cross-breeding team-building elements with Real Time Strategy elements.

Create teams to traverse across different types of terrains. Make strong teams, or scouter teams, that is up to you leader. 

Command your teams, to capture bases, and overthrow the enemy leaders of each map.

Still a prototype.
